parameter.name: baseUrl
parameter.label: Base URL
parameter.description: The base URL of the Konnected Alarm Panel.

parameter.name: blink
parameter.label: Blink
parameter.description: When set to false the Led on the device won't blink during transmission.

parameter.name: discovery
parameter.label: Discovery
parameter.description: If set to false the device will not respond to discovery requests via UPnP. Make sure you have statically assigned an IP address to the module before turning this setting off. See https://help.konnected.io/support/solutions/articles/32000023968-disabling-device-discovery

parameter.name: retryCount
parameter.label: Retry Count
parameter.description: The number of times the binding attempts to send http requests to the Konnected Alarm Panel. Increase this setting if you are experiencing situations where the module is reporting as offline but you can access the website of the Alarm Panel to confirm that the Alarm Panel is Konnected to the Network. This will allow the binding to attempt more retries before it considers the connection a failure and marks the thing as offline.

parameter.name: requestTimeout
parameter.label: Request Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout period in seconds for HTTP requests to the Konnected Alarm Panel. The default is 30. Adjusting this setting can help in networks situations with high latency where the binding is erroneously reporting the thing as offline.

parameter.name: callbackUrl
parameter.label: Callback URL
parameter.description: The URL where the Konnected panel will make callbacks. The default is to auto detect the port and IP address of openHAB. This may not work in case you use a reverse proxy or openHAB is running in Docker. Then the plugin is bound to the /konnected http context.

parameter.name: controller_softreset
parameter.label: Soft Reset Module
parameter.description: Send A Restart Command to the Module.

parameter.name: controller_removewifi
parameter.label: Factory Reset
parameter.description: Resets the module to Factory Conditions.

parameter.name: controller_sendConfig
parameter.label: Update Settings
parameter.description: Manually sends the settings to the module. The binding will send settings on every restart and if there are any configuration changes but this can be used to manually update the settings as needed.
